channel.title: AT&T blocks 4chan
channel.description:
[url]https://stormen.wordpress.com/2009/07/27/att-blocks-4chan/[/url]
This block seems to be targeted at the sections /b/ and /r9k/.
Status of the site can be viewed here:
[url]https://status.4chan.org/[/url]

item.title: AT&T blocks 4chan
item.dc:creator: Zsub
item.description:
JohnKiller118:

I know you’re not making generalizations. My comment was aimed at the ones that are generalizing, across the internet.

That would be me. Most of the time I do it to provoke discussion, sometimes I do it to troll. And sometimes I don’t even generalize at all. But one could safely make the generalization I generalize all the time

Read full topic

item.title: AT&T blocks 4chan
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
mattemuse:

Relax, just consider it a “teachable moment.” And there’s no need to insult yourself and other Americans, I’m not the one making generalizations.

I know you’re not making generalizations. My comment was aimed at the ones that are generalizing, across the internet.

item.title: AT&T blocks 4chan
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
mattemuse:

Where the hell is the “roll eyes” emoticon? “We” (I assume you’re American) would never invade an OPEC member in good standing. They sell us all the oil we want and they provide a convenient tax haven for our oil industry executives. It’s only when countries start defying OPEC and monkeying with the global flow of oilthat we need to “liberate” them.

It was a joke. When I make a joke for a forum post, I don’t study up to make sure it’s 100% accurate. I just see “oil”, “developing nation”, and I think “Iraq.” Then I shit out a joke and think to myself “oh boy this is soooo funny! Johnny, you’re so clever!”
And yes, I am an American. And according to every non-American internet user, I’m supposed to be 500 lbs, homophobic, right-wing, and stupid. You know, because that’s how all Americans are.

Read full topic

item.title: AT&T blocks 4chan
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
JohnKiller118:

Of course, once we find out about the oil, we’ll probably “liberate” the place and change all that.

Where the hell is the “roll eyes” emoticon? “We” (I assume you’re American) would never invade an OPEC member in good standing. They sell us all the oil we want and they provide a convenient tax haven for our oil industry executives. It’s only when countries start defying OPEC and monkeying with the global flow of oilthat we need to “liberate” them.

Read full topic

item.title: AT&T blocks 4chan
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
shifty:

Lol. Well why wouldn’t u want to? Life there is way more simple e.g. simple people and simple procedures to get things handled. Its oil rich. There isn’t any taxes and income is really high. Crime rates are from low to non existent (like 1 murder case every 25 years) since its inhabitants are follow the non killing part of religion . Its a developing country so its improving everyday. Only 4 months of winter and 8 months of summer (unfortunately the temperatures in summer are soo hot it makes Hell ashamed it cant compete with it).

Pro-tip: You learn that life is complicated, there’s no such thing has something having only disadvantages. Everything has its advantages and disadvantages which is why i have trouble making up my mind 90% of the time.

God, the place almost sounds like heaven! Or at least doesn’t sound like a complete shit hole with civil war, AIDs, and dictatorships like most “developing” nations.
Of course, once we find out about the oil, we’ll probably “liberate” the place and change all that.

Read full topic

item.title: AT&T blocks 4chan
item.dc:creator: Zsub
item.description:
Seriously Moving to a country full of mudslimes? That might actually not be a bad idea at all, seeing how everyone is always ranting on how they invade the western world 'n shit.

So basically, they move to our countries and get our stuff and we move to theirs. They won’t have any oil unless we give it to them, which off course we don’t and we get all the resources we need to build a decent civilization in that sandbox they call the middle-east.

I say it’s a win-win situation =D

Read full topic

item.title: AT&T blocks 4chan
item.dc:creator: shifty
item.description:
Collision:

Protip: Dont buy shit internet.

There’s only one Internet Service Provider and thats Q-Tel. Its a developing country, so far the fastest internet connection is a 2 Mb connection. If you think thats bad, any Islam state also censors kissing/making out scenes in any movie. If theres a movie poster with a female wearing a bikini they colour the poster in with a black pen to make it look like shes fully covered. So that means cover up her stomach, arms, legs and any side boobage. Here they also separate most of the schools (guess its a culture thing). All boys in one class and all girls in one class.

zim:

Protip: dont move to qatar

Lol. Well why wouldn’t u want to? Life there is way more simple e.g. simple people and simple procedures to get things handled. Its oil rich. There isn’t any taxes and income is really high. Crime rates are from low to non existent (like 1 murder case every 25 years) since its inhabitants are follow the non killing part of religion . Its a developing country so its improving everyday. Only 4 months of winter and 8 months of summer (unfortunately the temperatures in summer are soo hot it makes Hell ashamed it cant compete with it).

Pro-tip: You learn that life is complicated, there’s no such thing has something having only disadvantages. Everything has its advantages and disadvantages which is why i have trouble making up my mind 90% of the time.

Read full topic

item.title: AT&T blocks 4chan
item.dc:creator: shifty
item.description:
Collision:

Sux2b with AT&T.

That’s nothing. I live in the Middle East and our Internet Service Provider (named Q-Tel) incorporated the principal from Islam, that it is a sin to look at porn. They did this by blocking any access to porn sites. They also blocked access to sites that dont contain any nudity or anything sinful :meh:

If you are to visit a porn site this is what will appear on the internet browser:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Qtel

item.title: AT&T blocks 4chan
item.dc:creator: Paddy
item.description:
Because of the continual DOS attacks on 4chan, some companies blocked the site as a high amount of traffic was traveling through the internet backbone to just that one site limiting legitimate trafic speeds, so, they blocked it.
